ygData.msgSnippet: That would be an interesting twist, but I have some reservations and/or corrections. 1) Since the chars will literally be unearthed, it is only fitting that

Subject: Re: Characters

That would be an interesting twist, but I have some reservations
and/or corrections.

1) Since the chars will literally be unearthed, it is only fitting
that they won't be reactivated by the ones they were with. Because of
that, they will be found by the Pacificus, the Bushidos, the Silver
Wings, or the Iron Skulls. The Watchers don't perform archeological
searches; they have other business to tend to.

2) We'll also need to determine where the characters are reactivated.
After all, it will play a role in the reactions. Just imagine when
they find out the new bot in Olympus is a dreaded minion...

3) If the council decides the randomness, how will their char
distribution be random?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> This is an idea tha tI have in order to increase the tention and
creativity in this restart (to name it some how). instead you choose
the faction that you belong at first, the election will be radmonly:
> 
> Example:
> 
>   1.. Let give a Maxis number 1, Preds no 2, minions 3 and
tripeducus 4. 
>   2.. You won't know what's the faction name under the number. 
>   3.. You will said randmonly: Nighlight will go with number 3,
Windlord with munber 2 and Rodimus witn number 2. 
>   4.. All chars that will survive and be found in stasis in Earth
would be found by menbers whose belongs the number.
>   5.. You can do all rerprogramation and changes that wish.
> Why that? In order to burst creativity, tention and plots. 
> 
> If a bot is founded by members of a rival faction, can you imagine
what might happen?
> 
> Of course this is an idea 
> 
> Incase that this idea be aprobed, council members will share the
code and what number belongs to each faction each other,  and they
will follow a similar proces. Same ida can be aplied to new chars made
for the 'restart' but just for this time. 
> 
> After Re-star runs, characters will goinf faction/creat one, as
ussually have done.
> 
> What do you think about this idea?
